original_text: After many days you will have to bring your soldiers together to fight a battle. In the years at the end of time, you will go to attack the land of Israel. It will be a land that has become strong again after war. The people there will have returned from other nations. They will all be living safely in that land that had become heaps of stones. They will all be together on Israel's mountains.
korean_text: 여러 날 후 곧 말년에 네가 명령을 받고 그 땅 곧 오래 황폐하였던 이스라엘 산에 이르리니 그 땅 백성은 칼을 벗어나서 여러 나라에서 모여 들어오며 이방에서 나와 다 평안히 거주하는 중이라

sentences.original_text: After many days you will have to bring your soldiers together
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 날이 지나면 당신은 군인들을 모아야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: In the years at the end of time
you will go to attack the land of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이스라엘 땅을 공격하러 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: It will be a land that has become strong again after war
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 전쟁 후에 다시 강해진 땅이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The people there will have returned from other nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳의 사람들은 다른 나라들에서 돌아왔을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will all be living safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 안전하게 살고 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in that land that had become heaps of stones
They will all be together on Israel's mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 이스라엘의 산들에 함께 있을 것입니다
